## Interactive Plots

e.g plotly

Plot of bar chart of education levels by   from the infert daset on infertility

```{r}
education_plot <- 
infert %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = education, fill=education))+
    geom_bar()
ggplotly(education_plot)
```
